column1: Design Engineering with Advanced Product Development MSc
column3: Department of Design, Manufacture & Engineering Management
column5: This course addresses the issues associated with a rapidly changing market and the demands for better, cheaper and personalised products, developed within the shortest possible time.The Advanced Product Development stream is designed for those who wish to enhance their technical knowledge and practical design skills through the application of state-of-the-art manufacture to practical design settings through the specialisation in advanced materials and production technology, product design techniques and engineering risk management.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
